name: sprinting
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
present participle of
sprint
to run as fast as you can over a short distance, either in a race or because you are in a great hurry to get somewhere: We had to sprint to catch the bus.
Thesaurus: synonyms, antonyms, and examples
to runrunShe saw him running down the street.sprintI had to sprint to catch the bus.jog"What do you do to keep fit?" "I jog and go swimming."raceHe raced up the stairs to answer the phone.rushEveryone rushed to the door when the alarm went off.dashHe dashed out the door after the dog.
